lead_paragraph: Mad Max believes the best way to survive is to wander alone, but he becomes swept up with a group fleeing across the Wasteland in a War Rig driven by an elite Imperator, Furiosa.
snippet: Mad Max believes the best way to survive is to wander alone, but he becomes swept up with a group fleeing across the Wasteland in a War Rig driven by an elite Imperator, Furiosa.
